citances.sentence: In support of that submission the Applicant relied on the comments of McHugh J in SAAP v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2005] HCA 24 at [50] and [59], and also SZCQA v Minister for Immigration & Citizenship & Anor [2007] FCA 827.
